Ingredients.1: 3 tablespoons Spectrum Naturals® Canola Oil, divided

Ingredients.4: 1 (8 ounce) package sliced button or cremini mushrooms

Ingredients.5: 1 (170 gram) package Yves Veggie Cuisine® Beef Veggie Tenders

Ingredients.11: 0.5 cup The Greek Gods™ Traditional Plain Yogurt or sour cream

Ingredients.13: 1 (8 ounce) package Egg or egg-free noodles, cooked according to package directions

Directions.1: In a large non-stick skillet, heat 1 tablespoon (15 mL) of the oil over medium heat. Add onion; cook for 6 minutes, stirring occasionally, until soft. Add garlic and mushrooms; cook for 2 minutes, stirring often.

Directions.2: Stir in the Beef Veggie Tenders; cook for 1 minute. Remove everything to a large plate.

Directions.3: Add remaining 2 tablespoons (25 mL) oil to the skillet. Stir in flour; cook for about 2 minutes, stirring, until lightly browned.

Directions.4: Stir in broth, Dijon, thyme and seasoning salt. Cook for 2 minutes, until thickened. Return mixture to skillet. Cover and simmer over low heat for 5 minutes.

Directions.5: Stir in yogurt; warm through. Sprinkle top with parsley. Serve over hot cooked noodles.
